faq.headline: Questions? Here are answers.
faq.subheadline: What customers often want to know

items.q: How long does a project take?
items.a: START packages are ready in 1-2 weeks, BUSINESS packages in 3-4 weeks. For custom projects, we discuss the timeline in the kickoff call.

items.q: What exactly does a project cost?
items.a: Our prices are fixed prices - no hidden costs, no surprises. START from €5,390, BUSINESS from €11,990. For larger projects, we create a custom quote.
You receive a complete handover with documentation. Optional support and maintenance are available. Smaller adjustments can be made on request.
Yes! Every package includes an admin portal where you can manage texts, images and more yourself - no coding skills required.

items.q: What do you need from me?
items.a: Texts, images and logo (if available). We also help with content creation. We clarify everything else in the kickoff call.
50% at project start, 50% at handover. We accept bank transfer and card payment. Installment payment available on request.

impressum.title: Imprint
impressum.responsibleTitle: Responsible for content according to Section 55 para. 2 RStV
impressum.euDisputeText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
impressum.euDisputeNote: Our email address can be found above in the imprint.
impressum.consumerDisputeText: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
impressum.liabilityContentText: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws pursuant to Section 7 para. 1 TMG. However, according to Sections 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obliged as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
impressum.liabilityLinksText: Our offer contains links to external third-party websites, the content of which we have no influence over. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the linked pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
impressum.copyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

datenschutz.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutz.generalInfoText: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified.
datenschutz.dataCollectionQuestion: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
datenschutz.dataCollectionAnswer: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the imprint of this website.
datenschutz.hostingIntro: We host the contents of our website with the following provider:
datenschutz.externalHostingText: This website is hosted externally. The personal data collected on this website is stored on the host's servers. This may include IP addresses, contact requests, meta and communication data, contract data, contact details, names, website accesses and other data generated via a website.
datenschutz.privacyText: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
datenschutz.responsiblePartyIntro: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
datenschutz.contactFormText: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your details from the inquiry form including the contact data you provided there will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.
datenschutz.inquiryTitle: Inquiry by Email, Phone or Fax
datenschutz.inquiryText: If you contact us by email, telephone or fax, your inquiry including all resulting personal data (name, inquiry) will be stored and processed by us for the purpose of processing your request.
datenschutz.newsletterText: If you wish to receive the newsletter offered on the website, we require an email address from you as well as information that allows us to verify that you are the owner of the email address provided and that you agree to receive the newsletter.
datenschutz.rightsText: You have the right at any time to obtain free information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data.

hero.headline: Real
hero.description: Drag the slider and see the difference. From outdated websites to modern, conversion-optimized solutions.

industries.headline: Industries We Serve
industries.subheadline: Experience from various sectors for your requirements

note.text: The projects shown are representative examples. We are happy to discuss your specific requirements in a personal conversation.

cta.headline: Your project could be next
cta.subheadline: Let's discuss how we can help you too.

autohausSchmidt.title: Autohaus Schmidt
autohausSchmidt.subtitle: Premium car dealership with service booking
autohausSchmidt.summary: Modern web presence with integrated service booking system, vehicle gallery and automated lead management.
autohausSchmidt.challenge: Outdated website without online booking. Customers called or came by - inefficient for both sides.
autohausSchmidt.solution: New website with online appointment booking, vehicle showcase with filter function, and automatic inquiry routing to the right advisor.
autohausSchmidt.testimonial: "Our customers love the online booking. Less phone time, more consulting time."

kanzleiMueller.title: Mueller & Partners Law Firm
kanzleiMueller.subtitle: Law firm with client portal
kanzleiMueller.summary: Professional law firm website with protected client area, document upload and automated appointment reminders.
kanzleiMueller.challenge: Documents were exchanged via email, appointments made by phone. No central overview for clients.
kanzleiMueller.solution: Client portal with secure document storage, online appointment booking with calendar sync, automatic reminders.
kanzleiMueller.testimonial: "The portal saves us hours every day. Clients can view everything themselves."

praxisGesund.title: Praxis Gesund
praxisGesund.subtitle: Physiotherapy practice with online booking
praxisGesund.summary: Friendly practice website with therapist introduction, service overview and seamless online appointment booking.
praxisGesund.challenge: Reception was overwhelmed with appointment requests. Patients couldn't check availability themselves.
praxisGesund.solution: Online booking calendar with therapist selection, automatic confirmations and reminders, waitlist function.
praxisGesund.testimonial: "The reception can finally focus on patients on site."

agenturKreativ.title: Kreativ Agency
agenturKreativ.subtitle: Creative agency with portfolio & workflow
agenturKreativ.summary: Dynamic agency website with impressive portfolio, project request system and internal publishing workflow.
agenturKreativ.challenge: Portfolio was outdated, project inquiries unstructured, content publishing chaotic.
agenturKreativ.solution: Portfolio with project showcase, structured request form with automatic briefing, publishing pipeline for social media.
agenturKreativ.testimonial: "Finally we have a process. From briefing to publication - everything flows."

handwerkMeister.title: Master Electrical Engineering
handwerkMeister.subtitle: Electrical specialist with emergency service
handwerkMeister.summary: Trust-building craftsman website with service overview, emergency button and inquiry management.
handwerkMeister.challenge: No professional online presence. Inquiries were mixed up, emergency service requests were overlooked.
handwerkMeister.solution: Clear website with trust signals, prominent emergency CTA, prioritized inquiry routing by urgency.
handwerkMeister.testimonial: "Finally a website that shows what we can do. The inquiries have doubled."

coachErfolg.title: Success Coach Berlin
coachErfolg.subtitle: Business coach with booking system
coachErfolg.summary: Personal coach website with method presentation, package selection and direct calendar booking.
coachErfolg.challenge: Too much time coordinating appointments. No clear presentation of coaching packages and prices.
coachErfolg.solution: One-page with storytelling, clear package overview with prices, direct Calendly integration for initial consultations.
coachErfolg.testimonial: "My prospects now book directly. I can fully focus on my clients."

hero.headline1: Your systems are slowing you down.
hero.headline2: We turn them into a process that delivers.
hero.subheadline1: When inquiries get lost, handovers stall, and tasks are pulled manually, chaos emerges - not growth.
hero.subheadline2: We close these gaps with a clear system of website, workflows, and - when needed - web apps/apps. Stable, understandable, expandable.

problem.headline: Why good offers still
problem.subheadline: The service is often strong - but the process is weak. And that's exactly where inquiries, time, and revenue get lost.

noGuidance.title: Inquiries without guidance
noGuidance.desc: Visitors see content - but no clear next step.

handoversStall.title: Handovers that stall
handoversStall.desc: Information is scattered, responsibilities unclear, follow-ups cost time.

tooMuchManual.title: Too much manual work
tooMuchManual.desc: Posting, following up, sorting, responding: expensive, slow, error-prone.

noOverview.title: No operational overview
noOverview.desc: Problems only become visible when things are already on fire.

leistungen.headline: Services that work together as a
leistungen.subheadline: We don't build "individual components". We connect everything so it works in daily operations: clear entry -> clear handovers -> clear results.

website.title: Website
website.subtitle: Center & Guidance
website.desc: Your website becomes a clear path: people immediately understand what you offer - and how they should act. No detours, no guessing.
bullets: Structure & page logic that guides visitors
Live-ready: technically prepared for visibility & measurability

workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.subtitle: Processes instead of follow-ups
workflows.desc: Workflows make recurring steps reliable. They save time, reduce errors, and ensure things don't get stuck.
bullets: Publishing flow: Plan -> Review -> Approve -> Publish
Quality stays consistent: templates & checks instead of gut feeling
workflows.note: Workflows are built to be understood: clear steps, clear states, clear responsibilities.

apps.title: Web Apps & Apps
apps.subtitle: When you need more than pages
apps.desc: If you need logins, portals, dashboards, bookings, or internal tools, we build a real system - cleanly structured and production-ready.
apps.note: Apps don't automatically include workflows. Workflows can be added and connected separately.

ablauf.headline: A process from start to finish -
ablauf.subheadline: To keep things fast, clean, and reliable, we work in a fixed system. You always see where we stand - and what happens next.

1.title: Analysis
1.subtitle: Understand & Capture
1.desc: Goal, offer, paths, handovers: We find the levers that actually improve inquiries and operations.

2.title: Structure
2.subtitle: Plan & Organize
2.desc: Page logic, content, CTAs, user paths - as clean architecture.

3.title: Implementation
3.subtitle: Build & Connect
3.desc: We build, test, set up, and connect everything agreed upon - traceable and stable.

4.title: Go-live & Handover
4.subtitle: Review & Completion
4.desc: Joint review, go-live, structured handover. After that, the project is complete - additional services only if separately agreed.

anbindungen.headline: Connections & Activations
anbindungen.description: Some projects need additional activations to run 100% smoothly (e.g., platform approvals, additional channels, extended setups). These points are service-specific depending on scope and calculated on request.
items: Connections to social media channels / additional platforms
Extended integrations beyond the standard setup
anbindungen.note: You receive a clear estimate upfront. No hidden costs.

eigentum.headline: Ownership instead of dependency
eigentum.description: Upon request, we hand over the project as code (repository/project files). This way you own the structure and implementation - and can have it extended flexibly at any time.
eigentum.note: Handover scope, rights, and content are clearly defined in the offer.

vertraulichkeit.headline: Confidentiality is standard
vertraulichkeit.description: Upon request, we sign a confidentiality agreement (NDA) before project start. Concepts, processes, documents, and code are treated confidentially.

finalCta.headline: Start free. Decide clearly.
finalCta.description: Start with the free website check or book an appointment directly. After that, you'll know in a short time if your website is losing inquiries - and which next step actually makes sense.

meta.title: Bot Shop - 100+ Premium Automation Bots | AgentFlowMarketing
meta.description: Ready-to-use bots for rent or purchase. Based on 2,061 real n8n workflows. From AI-powered WhatsApp support to complete CRM automation.

items.a: A workflow is an automated sequence of actions triggered by specific events. They work 24/7 and handle repetitive tasks.
No! All workflows come pre-configured and ready to use. You just need to connect your accounts.

items.q: How does rent vs. buy work?
items.a: Rent: Monthly payment, we host everything, updates included. Buy: One-time payment, you get the complete workflow for self-management.
Yes! During setup, we customize the workflow to your needs. Further adjustments are possible anytime.
You get access to the workflow within 24h. We set everything up and provide training if needed.
Yes! 14-day money-back guarantee for rent. For purchase: Support until everything runs smoothly.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Settings
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and optimize our services. Some are necessary, others help us analyze the website and personalize advertising.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are required for basic website functionality and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website (Google Analytics).

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to make advertising more relevant (Meta Pixel, Google Ads).
